title: League Crashes or Freezes My Laptop
body: This morning i woke up to play league, just to find that it freezes 1 minute in-game.  My team /remaked and i got 5 20 minute queues.  I thought it was just a small glitch or bug so i decided to wait the 20 minutes and tried to play again, but it did the same thing.  Might have 10, 20 minute queues.  Please Help Riot.  Do i still have to have the low priority queues?

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be running Windows 10 with the Game DVR feature that was enabled by the anniversary update. I recommend [disabling the Windows Game Bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the problem. 

Let me know if this helped.
